item.title: In-N-Out
item.description:
Rating: 5 Star

In-N-Out must be one of the most famous burgers in California. It’s tasty with fresh ingredients and sunflower oil to fry fries with incredible low prices.

Their menu is simple, with cheeseburger and double-double (which contains two beef paties for meat lovers), french fries and drink fountains.

Tips: Try their secret menu to have grilled onions, extra toast bun, and if you are a cheese lover, the monster style to add double cheese on your fries!

Website

item.title: Popeyes
item.description:
Rating: 4 Star

The first bite of popeyes chicken sandwitch is amazing!! It is definitely not one of the most healthies burgers, I can taste the oily and heavy salts, but once in several months, I will let it go and give myself a break without concentrating on the calories I consume lol.

However, the popeyes stores in Seattle area are very corse. Everytime I went there is a long car line waiting to get orders. I really miss the ones in NYC which even provides free dilivery and those in CAs which only takes a few mins to prepare my order!

Website
